about_the_game:
Stand against cruelty in the lands deprived of hope.

Carve Your Path to Follow Your Destiny

Reikon: Reawaken is an immersive action-adventure game that puts you in the shoes of a lone warrior. As you delve into this dangerous world of the fictional Far East, you will encounter a multitude of enemies, each with their own unique abilities and strengths. But with the mysterious sword, you are ready to face the challenges that come your way. Fight against enemies that occupy these lands to bring peace and find answers.

The Sacred Art of Swordsmanship: Honing Your Skills with Deadly Techniques

At the heart of the game is the art of swordsmanship. As you progress through the game, you will have the opportunity to hone your skills and become a master swordsman. You will learn a variety of different techniques, from quick slashes to powerful strikes, each with its own strengths and weaknesses.
But mastering the sword is not just about physical prowess. It also requires a deep understanding of the art of combat and a keen sense of strategy. You need to be one with your sword and have a great sense of outside threats.

Key Features:


  • Unique control scheme that uses mouse swing for sword attacks.
  • Tense sword action.
  • Story-driven gameplay.
  • Immersive environments.
